hymn.title: O Lord, I love You, I really love You

layout.singingstanza: O Lord, I love You, I real -- ly love You, With -- out You life's real -- ly noth -- ing. You are so at -- tract -- ing, And You are so char -- ming; Your rich -- es are un -- search -- a -- ble. Your name's so dear and sweet, Call -- ing makes one sat -- is -- fied, Now You are mine and I am Thine, Lord; Joined and min -- gled with You, God- -- man in -- cor -- p'ra -- tion, Fore -- taste of the New Je -- ru -- sa -- lem.

lyrics.stanza: O Lord, I love You, I really love You, Without You life's really nothing. You are so attracting, And You are so charming; Your riches are unsearchable. Your name's so dear and sweet, Calling makes one satisfied, Now You are mine and I am Thine, Lord; Joined and mingled with You, God-man incorporation, Foretaste of the New Jerusalem.
